metadata.name: DOPE303_Hardware#004
metadata.description:
A reproduction of the famous TB-303 a drum machine created by Roland between 1982-1983

Known for his "acid" sound and his huge impact on electronic music (Techno, House, IDM) 

Examples of tracks made with TB-303 :

Phuture â€“ Acid Tracks 
Daft Punk - Da Funk
Sleezy D - I've Lost Control 

Made with Aseprite.
HPMNK/2022
